rows.label: qev027103_MSG0001
rows.name:
I have awaited your return, O bringer of light to our
dark future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0002
rows.name: Everything has gone perfectly thanks to your efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0003
rows.name:
A fleet of reporters mobbed Adappin after his speech.
You can imagine the results when he eagerly
confirmed every suggestion they threw out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0004
rows.name:
I feel sorry for the fellow, of course, but this is
about the future of all. We Orphe will remember
his sacrifice always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0005
rows.name:
Now that Adappin has dropped out, the Nopon
representative has finally begun campaigning in
earnestâ€”after much urging from us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0006
rows.name:
He shall be giving his first speech here today.
I hope you will attend and hear what he has to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0007
rows.name:
Ah, here we are. I believe he is set to begin.
This is Kopopo, the Nopon candidate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0008
rows.name:
Er... *AHEM!*
*ahem* *ahem*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0009
rows.name: Hello, one and all. Kopopo is representative of Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0010
rows.name:
If Kopopo elected to serve on provisional government,
he do many fine things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0011
rows.name: First thing Kopopo do is establish Nopon tax![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0012
rows.name:
That mean all Nopon shopping in New LA pay
negative 80 percent tax rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0013
rows.name:
This daring new policy sure to bring massive economic
growth! ...To Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Government by Nopon, of Nopon, for Nopon!
This promise of Kopopo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0015
rows.name:
And by "promise," Kopopo mean "thing forced on
everyone else."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0016
rows.name: So vote for Kopopo! Yaaay![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0017
rows.name: I do not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0018
rows.name: I do not even have the words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0019
rows.name: This is no better than the Ma-non platform![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0020
rows.name:
Hmm... Perhaps it is my expectations that are
unreasonable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0021
rows.name:
Even if the specific rhetoric is a bit unbalanced,
having someone within the government advocating
for xenoform rights and issues is what really matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0022
rows.name:
It is the dialogue that emerges from this process which
will guide the future of the city's governance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0023
rows.name:
But what are your thoughts?
Is the Nopon a viable candidate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_JNK0010
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev027103_SEL0011
rows.name: Shrug and say that Kopopo will probably be fine.

rows.label: qev027103_JNK0020
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev027103_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest that an Orphean should run instead.

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0024
rows.name:
Right then. We shall just have to keep faith that
we have done the proper thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0025
rows.name:
And naturally, sending Kopopo as our government
representative is not the end of our efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0026
rows.name:
All of us shall continue to support his work,
regardless of race. Both to further establish our rights,
and to foster a deeper partnership with humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0027
rows.name:
Your efforts in making this possible have been
most commendable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0028
rows.name: I thank you on behalf of all New LA xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0029
rows.name: ...Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0030
rows.name: ...Us? Rather than the Nopon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0031
rows.name:
That is not...
We have never considered such a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0032
rows.name: My race represents an extremely small minority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0033
rows.name:
I am afraid we simply cannot expect the same
volume of votes as a Ma-non or Nopon candidate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0034
rows.name:
This fact is what forced us to adopt more indirect
measures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0035
rows.name:
If I thought the support was there, it might be
something to consider. However, it feels like a
less-than-realistic hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0036
rows.name:
Though now that it is on the table, would you mind
asking some of the city's residents how they feel
about the prospect of an Orphean representative?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0037
rows.name: I would very much appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027103_MSG0038
rows.name:
If enough support is present across racial lines,
we will accept the will of the people and announce
our candidacy.[ST:wait ]
